ygData.messageBody:
> Talies the bedraggled Wanderer
> Bristlebane
>
> P.S. Medium Banded. I'm a Half-elf, and sometimes that is such a pain,
> when all your friends are elves... *sigh*
>

Actuaully I used to agree with this more then I do now. I realized while sure
we need med armor, and yea we can't hide or forage for dragon dung.. we are at base better combatants' hardier, and have much better looking banded then just about anyone else :)

Adon bard of Povar
